history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02125
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PRESCRIBING THE MECHANISMS TO FACILITATE THE DISPOSITION OF IDLE GOVERNMENT-OWNED LANDS FOR SOCIALIZED HOUSING
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : OCAMPO, ROSENDA ANN
DATE FILED : 2016-07-28
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Economic
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Violago (064 2017-01-31)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Under deliberation by the Mother Committee on 2016-12-14
      2. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2017-08-23
          -Deferred approval pending submission of documents requested from National Housing Authority, Commission on Audit, Government Service Insurance System, Social Security System, Philippine Reclamation Authority and Government-owned and controlled corporations -House Bills No. 228, 1724, 2125 and 2807
      3. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2018-02-28
          -Substitute Bill Approved by the Committee -House Bills No. 228, 1724, 2125 and 2807
      4. Committee Report Approved on 2018-08-29
      5. Committee Report filed on 2018-11-14
          --CR No. 00925 on HB No. 08553 -Approved on Second Reading (2018-11-27) -Approved on Third Reading (2018-12-04) -Transmitted to and received by the Senate (2018-12-06)
MOTHER BILL: HB08553
